title: Chentan’s Memories - Novel Updates
tags: Ancient Times   Business Management   Cooking   Death of Loved Ones   Doting Parents   Enemies Become Lovers   Heartwarming   Kind Love Interests   Lazy Protagonist   Manly Gay Couple   Mismatched Couple   Near-Death Experience   Slow Romance   Tsundere   Unconditional Love   Wealthy Characters
author: Liang Azha   梁阿渣
description: A young master of the wealthy Jinling House. A normal rebellious military official that retired from Chengdu. Two men with very different backgrounds each have a plan for their new life. Due to an unexpected turn of events, both meet at a small town in Jiangnan, and start living under the same roof. As a result, their new beautiful life has turned into a daily routine...>
